experience.title: Manager
experience.description: GyanSys is a prominent mid-sized systems integration company with a global reach. Known for its innovative approach to digital and process transformation, the company specializes in SAP and Salesforce implementations, managed services, and data analytics. We deploy advanced solutions in complex multi-cloud environments, enabling companies to streamline operations and boost return on investment.With a team of over 2,000 experts, GyanSys is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, and operates from multiple delivery centers across the globe.If you're interested in exploring technology solutions to simplify your business processes and unlock new value, please feel free to contact me.

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: ▪️ Purified P-43, an important constituent of Multi-aaRS complex in plasmodium falciparum using Ni-NTA, Heparin, and gel permeation chromatography to explore the possibility of MSC as possible therapeutic anti-malarial target				▪️ Ligand binding studies using amino-acylation assay and thermal shift assay were performed with potential drugs and enzyme for efficient binding.
